select `pcam`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`,`c`.`issuer` AS `issuer`,`pa`.`company_name` AS `name`,`pw`.`website_id` AS `website_id`,`pw`.`name` AS `website_name` from (((((((((`cardbank${database.suffix}`.`cards` `c` join `cardbank${database.suffix}`.`ccx_cms_map` `map` on((`c`.`card_id` = `map`.`ccx_card_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_card_affiliate_map` `pcam` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `pcam`.`card_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_affiliates` `pa` on((`pcam`.`affiliate_id` = `pa`.`affiliate_id`))) left join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_websites` `pw` on((`pa`.`affiliate_id` = `pw`.`affiliate_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_page_map` `ccpm` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `ccpm`.`cardId`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_pages` `cp` on((`cp`.`cardpageId` = `ccpm`.`cardpageId`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map` `cpsm` on((`cpsm`.`cardpageId` = `cp`.`cardpageId`))) join `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cards` `rt_c` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `rt_c`.`cardId`))) left join `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`cs_pagecardexclusionmap` `cpcem` on(((`cpcem`.`siteid` = `cpsm`.`categoryId`) and (`cpcem`.`pageid` = `cpsm`.`cardpageId`) and (`cpcem`.`cardid` = `ccpm`.`cardId`)))) where (isnull(`cpcem`.`mapid`) and (`pa`.`deleted` = 0) and (`pa`.`status` = 'ACTIVE') and (`cpsm`.`categoryId` = 35) and (`c`.`deleted` = 0) and (`rt_c`.`deleted` = 0) and (`rt_c`.`active` = 1) and (`rt_c`.`site_code` = 'USEN') and (`cp`.`active` = 1) and (`cp`.`deleted` = 0))

select `pcam`.`affiliate_id` AS `affiliate_id`,`c`.`issuer` AS `issuer`,`pa`.`company_name` AS `name`,`pw`.`website_id` AS `website_id`,`pw`.`name` AS `website_name` from (((((((((`cardbank${database.suffix}`.`cards` `c` join `cardbank${database.suffix}`.`ccx_cms_map` `map` on((`c`.`card_id` = `map`.`ccx_card_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_card_affiliate_map` `pcam` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `pcam`.`card_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_affiliates` `pa` on((`pcam`.`affiliate_id` = `pa`.`affiliate_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`partner_websites` `pw` on((`pa`.`affiliate_id` = `pw`.`affiliate_id`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_card_page_map` `ccpm` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `ccpm`.`cardId`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_pages` `cp` on((`cp`.`cardpageId` = `ccpm`.`cardpageId`))) join `cccomus${database.suffix}`.`cms_page_site_map` `cpsm` on((`cpsm`.`cardpageId` = `cp`.`cardpageId`))) join `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`rt_cards` `rt_c` on((`map`.`cms_card_id` = `rt_c`.`cardId`))) left join `ccdata${database.suffix}`.`cs_pagecardexclusionmap` `cpcem` on(((`cpcem`.`siteid` = `cpsm`.`categoryId`) and (`cpcem`.`pageid` = `cpsm`.`cardpageId`) and (`cpcem`.`cardid` = `ccpm`.`cardId`)))) where (isnull(`cpcem`.`mapid`) and (`pa`.`deleted` = 0) and (`pa`.`status` = 'ACTIVE') and (`cpsm`.`categoryId` = 35) and (`c`.`deleted` = 0) and (`rt_c`.`deleted` = 0) and (`rt_c`.`active` = 1) and (`rt_c`.`site_code` = 'USEN') and (`cp`.`active` = 1) and (`cp`.`deleted` = 0))
